column2:
This is a detailed list of the history of PUIR and the many modders who have worked on the mod and made forks of it over a period longer than a decade. 
An additional thanks has to go to the Victoria 2 Community as a whole for playing all these mods and giving feedback on them all and the modders for working on them. Alongside the hosts who take up the thankless task of hosting in this community.                              
§GPUIR History:§!
